pageContent: Background: High-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) is a minimally invasive technique used in achieve coagulation necrosis. We evaluated biochemical disease-free survival rates, predictors of clinical outcome and morbidity in patients with localized prostate cancer treated with HIFU.

metaData.source:
The comparative oncologic effectiveness of available management strategies for clinically localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27133953/
